TxDOT_AADT.name: TxDOT AADT Traffic Counts
TxDOT_AADT.description: Annual Average Daily Traffic counts for Texas roadways

TxDOT_Speed_Limits.name: TxDOT Speed Limits
TxDOT_Speed_Limits.description: Posted speed limits on Texas state-maintained roadways
TxDOT_Speed_Limits.notes: SPD_MAX is the maximum posted speed limit in MPH

TxDOT_Roadbed_Surface.name: TxDOT Roadbed Surface Type
TxDOT_Roadbed_Surface.description: Pavement surface type and condition for Texas roadways
TxDOT_Roadbed_Surface.notes: SURF_TYP indicates surface type (A=Asphalt, C=Concrete, G=Gravel, etc.)

TxDOT_Functional_Class.name: TxDOT Functional Classification
TxDOT_Functional_Class.description: Federal functional classification of Texas roadways

TxDOT_Top_100_Congested.name: TxDOT Top 100 Most Congested Roadways
TxDOT_Top_100_Congested.description: Top 100 most congested roadway sections in Texas
